lead_paragraph: The writer, director, producer and star of "The Birth of a Nation" says the Sundance Institute offered him encouragement and support when he needed it most.

headline.main: Nate Parker Accepts Sundance Award, Creates Youth Fellowship
headline.print_headline: Nate Parker Accepts Sundance Award, Creates Youth Fellowship

snippet: The writer, director, producer and star of "The Birth of a Nation" says the Sundance Institute offered him encouragement and support when he needed it most....
